name: Tailor Page Builder: WooCommerce Extension
author: The Tailor Team

sections.description:
This extension adds e-commerce functionality to the Tailor frontend page builder based on the popular WooCommerce plugin. Display products, testimonials and pricing information easily using Tailor’s simple and intuitive drag and drop interface.

Tailor version 1.7.2 (or newer) must be active to use this extension

To get started with Tailor, refer to our documentation.

You can get in touch with questions or recommendations in a number of ways:

  1. Facebook or Twitter at @tailorwp or @andrewjworsfold.
  2. The Help Center
  3. The GitHub project
  4. The Community Forum

If you like the plugin, you can help by rating it.
sections.installation:
1. Install Tailor

  2. Install the extension via the plugin directory, or by uploading the files manually to your server.

From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’.

  2. Search for ‘Tailor’.

  3. Activate Tailor from your Plugins page. Do the same for the WooCommerce extension.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download Tailor and the WooCommerce extension.

  2. Upload the ‘tailor’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc..). Do the same for the ‘tailor-woocommerce’ directory.

  3. Activate Tailor and the WooCommerce extension from your Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install Tailor

  2. Install the extension via the plugin directory, or by uploading the files manually to your server.

From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’.

  2. Search for ‘Tailor’.

  3. Activate Tailor from your Plugins page. Do the same for the WooCommerce extension.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download Tailor and the WooCommerce extension.

  2. Upload the ‘tailor’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc..). Do the same for the ‘tailor-woocommerce’ directory.

  3. Activate Tailor and the WooCommerce extension from your Plugins page.

Can I use my existing WordPress theme?

Yes! Tailor (and this extension) works out-of-the-box with nearly every WordPress theme.

Can I include Tailor (and this extension) as part of my theme bundle?

Yes, however, users should be directed to the WordPress plugin repository to install the latest version of the plugin/extension. Consider using a tool like TGM Plugin Activation to guide users through the installation process.
sections.changelog:
1.2.1

  • Added – Responsive settings for the Products, Testimonial and Pricing elements.
  • Added – Quotation mark color setting to Testimonial element.

Note: This version requires Tailor version 1.7.2 (or newer).

1.2.0

  • Added – Filter for HTML attributes of default elements.
  • Added – Filter for the rendered HTML of default elements.
  • Added – Image link option to the Products element to align with the Posts element.

1.1.1

  • Added – Filter to modify the rendered HTML of a given element.
  • Updated: Compatibility with new method of registering elements in Tailor. Please ensure you upgrade to Tailor 1.6.0 or later.
  • Removed – Unnecessary child views.

1.1.0

  • Updated: Compatibility with new and improved Tailor JS API. Please ensure you upgrade to Tailor 1.5.0 or later.

1.0.1

  • Added: Check to ensure WooCommerce pages (Shop, Cart, Checkout and My Account) cannot be Tailored.
  • Added: Custom icons for WooCommerce related elements.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: Create a stylish storefront with this powerful extension for the free Tailor frontend page builder!

upgrade_notice.1.1.1: • This update provides compatibility for the new method of registering element child container in Tailor 1.6.0. Please ensure that you also upgrade Tailor to at least 1.6.0.
upgrade_notice.1.1.0: • This update provides compatibility for the new JS API provided in Tailor 1.5.0. Please ensure that you also upgrade Tailor to at least 1.5.0.

screenshots.caption: Products element - Display products from your store in highly customizable list, grid and carousel layouts.
Pricing element - Display your pricing structure using pricing tables. Create a column structure to highlight multiple pricing plans.
Testimonials element - Display customer testimonials or any other social proof anywhere on your site.
